Punch/Jaws:



Punch continued random scans of the entire island, finding nothing irregular. 
 It had been quite a long time since he had seen combat, and even longer 
since the Alliance had even been attacked directly.

------

Jaws swam in his great white shark deep in the depths of the ocean, 
performing reconassiance behind the shields, just in case of an intruder.
